name: Challenge Road Block Sky 3d
description:
New skyscraper challenge where you will have to build a ladder and skip the block ,The game contains more than 100 different levels. This is a game that will keep you on the edge of your seat. The graphics make for an extraordinary gaming experience. Being tactical in your movements will result in you becoming victorious. Be entertained and enjoy the new era of gaming. Have a great time.

Game Features:

• Amazing graphics and sound effects 

• easy to play 

• Hitch and stunt navigation simulation
